author: Paula Martinez
title: Experienced Resort-Like Amenities in Wildflower
text:
If you’re looking for your dream home, Wildflower by Minto Communities in Airdrie is the perfect opportunity. On September 21, from 11 a.m. to 2 p.m., Wildflower will welcome home buyers and their families to a fun-filled event to celebrate the launch of remarkable new homes. This range of contemporary homes to suit all lifestyles includes front-garage, single-family homes from the low $600s, spacious townhomes from the high $400s, and sleek, modern condos from the high $200s.
Whichever type of home you choose, you’ll love the unique, curated interior design and architecture. Each home is a stunning showcase of sophistication and rustic charm. At the Wildflower Design Centre, you can choose from a range of customizable floor plans.
Nestled on the west side of Airdrie, Wildflower is a unique, previously sold-out, new community offering breathtaking views and access to exclusive homeowner amenities. The upcoming launch event lets visitors get to know Wildflower, and features activities for everyone.
Tour the three show homes, enter the raffle contest to win an e-bike, explore the newly finished playground with the kids, play pickleball or basketball, try out the bike pump track, shop the local vendor Mini Market, and enjoy delicious burgers and popsicles catered by Minto Communities. To discover more of the community, take a refreshing walk along the pathways and check out the views.
First-class amenities, all year-round Moving into Wildflower opens the door to a host of incredible homeowner amenities that create an irresistible resort-like experience. Your membership in the Homeowners Association gives you access to the private Hillside Hub, home to Airdrie’s first outdoor pool. Swim and relax poolside throughout the summer, gather ‘round the fire pit and skate on the rink in the winter. Relax in the hot tub, and entertain friends in the amenity building any time of year. Plus, Wildflower’s expansive parks and community trails provide ample opportunities for relaxation, recreation and connection.
Offering a range of affordable homes, incredible amenities, proximity to Calgary, lush parkland and retail shopping, Wildflower stands out as an exceptional place to live. It’s no surprise Airdrie’s newest sensation was nominated at the BILD Calgary Region Awards as one of the best new communities.
Built by a trusted leader Minto Communities is a leading real estate developer known for its commitment to building high-quality communities, as well as its culture of inclusiveness and innovation. Minto was named one of Canada’s Best Managed Companies in 2024, a testament to its leadership in strategy, innovation, culture, governance and financial performance.
With a commitment that goes beyond construction, Minto has built over 100,000 homes in the last 70 years across Canada and the United States. The company has closed on 500 homes in Calgary alone, and is proud to be part of Airdrie’s vibrant future.
Whether you’re a first-time buyer or looking for your forever home, plan to join Minto Communities at the September 21 event for first access to the new release of front-garage homes, townhomes and condos.
Visit mintowildflower.com to register.
